body:
-d, --docs option will edit doc files.

Also improves edit command suffix extrapolation for core files. Previously assumed all files are '*.py', which doesn't work or docs. Now checks filesystem for all files of that name, and will die gracefully if != 1.

You can also now specify a full name including suffix for internal files. 

No change in behavior for package files.
title: add -d option for edit command
